name: MGRL
description:
"Welcome to the deep and deadly dungeons of Svogthos. You are an aspiring planeswalker in search of the Orb of Knowledge, known to lie deep under ground."

MGRL is a roguelike game written for the 7day Roguelike Challenge 2013. The objective of the game is to get to dungeon level 15 and obtaining the Orb of Knowledge.
